description:
Traited class [tvb.simulator.coupling.Kuramoto]

Provides a Kuramoto-style coupling, a periodic difference of the form

\begin{equation*} a / N G_ij sin(x_j - x_i) \end{equation*}

Attributes declared

a : tvb.simulator.coupling.Kuramoto.a = NArray(label='\(a\)', dtype=float64, default=array([1.]), dim_names=(), ndim=None, required=True)
Rescales the connection strength.
